com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class AddActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.AddActionController

  • public class AddActionController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to adding a new Action instance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action action
      A newly created instance of Action that is to be added in the database
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute> actionAttributeList
      An ArrayList of ActionAttribute used to display all the ActionAttribute(s) newly created related to the new Action instance that is to be created.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> actionAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ActAttrValues instances used to display the already added instances of ActAttrValues corresponding to the ActionAttribute selected by the user.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute attribute
      A instance of ActionAttribute used to store the relevant data when the user chooses to add a new ActionAttribute instance.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute selectedActionAttribute
      An instance of ActionAttribute used to store the ActionAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> selectedAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ActAttrValues instances used to add additional ActAttrValues instances to an instance of ActionAttribute.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues value
      A instance of ActAttrValues used to store the relevant data when the user chooses to add a new ActAttrValues instance.
